Prerequisite: Paladin or swordmage, proficiency with longsword

Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Heal checks.

On your turn, if you hit an enemy with an attack power associated with this feat while using a longsword, you gain a +2 power bonus to saving throws at the end of your turn. If you ended your turn more than 2 squares away from where you started, the bonus is instead +5.

Associated Powers:

Greenflame Blade

,

Holy Strike

Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 65.
